mapper.select: SELECT report_sq "reportSq", type_sq "typeSq", report_dt "reportDt", report_cc_sq "reportCcSq", report_ct "reportCt", report_cnt "reportCnt", report_st "reportSt" FROM report_t WHERE report_sq = #{reportSq}
mapper.update: UPDATE report_t SET type_sq = #{typeSq}, report_dt = #{reportDt}, report_cc_sq = #{reportCcSq}, report_ct = #{reportCt}, report_cnt = #{reportCnt}, report_st = #{reportSt} WHERE report_sq = #{reportSq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO report_t ( report_sq, type_sq, report_dt, report_cc_sq, report_ct, report_cnt, report_st ) VALUES ( #{reportSq}, #{typeSq}, #{reportDt}, #{reportCcSq}, #{reportCt}, #{reportCnt}, #{reportSt} )
